title: Wear Party Mode
summary: Impress people in the club would sound visualizer on your wrist!
description: Note: This app requires Android Wear powered watch (Samsung Gear Live or LG G Watch).Wear Party Mode gives you unique style in the club. Application analyzes realtime ambient sounds and visualizes them on your wrist. You can choose from diferrent visualizer styles and customize color.Let's get the party started!
descriptionHTML:
Note: This app requires Android Wear powered watch (Samsung Gear Live or LG G Watch).

Wear Party Mode gives you unique style in the club. Application analyzes realtime ambient sounds and visualizes them on your wrist. You can choose from diferrent visualizer styles and customize color.

Let's get the party started!
comments: Looks like it would be VERY cool................. ..............................If it worked, I have a brand new Sony Xperia Z5 6883 dual with a Sony Smartwatch 3 and if you even breathe towards this application, it crashes. Looks like it is happening to everyone by the comments I have been reading. Shame, it doesn't work, I'd totally dig it.
Amazing I love this app. Kinda unless but pretty cool non the less. Could you try and make it a watch face?
Delayed response that gets longer Doesn't respond in real time, and the longer it runs, the more the delay increases. (Moto 360)
Crashes on lollipop Great app but crashes on moto x 2014 but still runs on moto 360
I like, but it crashes I like the app but it doesn't stay running. It'll crash after 5 min then when I reopen it flickers instead.
So much fun!! I love this app.  Then again, I am a light freak.  Love it.  Thank you for wonderful fun app.  Fully recommend.
recentChanges: One more fix for Moto 360, should work now!
